title: How do I Level Up on the Boards?
body: Sorry if this question has already been answered, but how do I level up? I really would like to be able to comment and post discussions in gameplay, but I don't know how to get to level 7. Thanks in advance, and sorry again if this question has been answered before.

replies.body:
Your Boards profile doesn't sync with your in-game profile until you post or upvote / downvote a post. You're all synced now! Have a Splash Posting!

(Credits to Porocles for enlightening me on the upvote / downvote) 

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg

It looks like your profile has successfully leveled up already!  Sometimes a profile needs to sync to the boards, and it looks like your post did the trick!  Let us know if you have any other issues posting.
